title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE21001 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsHistorical background, wind-data, basic shape factors, bluff body aerodynamics, Wind tunnels and measurement techniques, Dynamic effects, aeroelastic phenomena, Application to buildings, chimneys, towers, bridges, automobiles, etc; Design practice, case studies.

title: Student Opinion
text: The course description in ERP is misleading. The course should be called Meteorology. There isn't even any aerodynamics involved and the class is boring beyond measure.
